item.title: About
item.description: Education 2010-2012 Master of Electrical Engineering; Auburn University 2005-2010 Bachelor of Electrical Engineering; Auburn University Experience Open Robotics, Mountain View, California Software Engineer (2018-present) Urban Engine, Huntsville, Alabama Chairman of the Board (2018-present) Board Member (2016-2018) NuSpatial, Huntsville, Alabama Robotics Software Engineer (2015-2018) Leidos, Huntsville, Alabama Embedded Software Engineer (2013-2015) MIT Lincoln Laboratory, Lexington, Massachusetts Associate Staff (2012-2013) Auburn University , Auburn, Alabama
